title: Ruff landing: Adorable moment a plucky puppy tries to leap off a chair onto a bed - but fails
text:
This is the cute moment a puppy tries to make it from a chair to the bed in one big jump but fails and falls to the floor.

The adorable footage was taken in Hyattsville, Prince George's County, in the US on September 30.

The puppy named Storm looks around to assess her options from the office chair she is stood on.

Left: Storm the puppy from Hyattsville, Prince George's County, in the US, assesses her options first before making the jump. Right: She then leaps up and hopefully stretches out her white paws to reach the bed

She then leaps up and hopefully stretches out her white paws to reach the bed but doesn't quite make it.

The pooch then quickly falls to the floor after misjudging the distance from the chair to the bed.

The person filming in the room can be heard laughing in the background after the epic fail.

The dog's owner said: 'Storm kept crying to get on the chair, so I finally put her on it and she jumped for the bed but misses.'
description: Storm the puppy from Hyattsville, Prince George's County, in the US, assesses her options first before making the jump but misjudges the distance and falls to the ground.
